full_summary:
=====================

**Tender Notice for Community Assessments and Parole Supervision Services**

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Reference Number:** cb-7279-7755459

**Solicitation Number:** 21882-23-0063

**Publication Date:** July 14, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** July 31, 2023, 17:00:00 (PST)

**Proposed Contract Period:** October 1, 2023 to September 30, 2024 with option to extend for four additional one-year periods

**Estimated Contract Value:** $90,000 (GST/HST extra)

**Notice Description:**

The Correctional Service Canada is seeking a contractor to provide community assessments and parole supervision services for offenders on conditional release and Long-Term Supervision Orders (LTSO). The contract is for a period of one year with an option to extend for four additional one-year periods. The estimated contract value is $90,000 (GST/HST extra).

**Objective:**

The objective of this contract is to contribute to the protection of society by providing case management services to offenders on conditional release and LTSO. The contractor will be responsible for performing tasks related to the Statement of Work, including supervision, risk assessment, and report writing.

**Key Deliverables:**

* Provide case management services to offenders on conditional release and LTSO
* Conduct community assessments and supervise offenders in the community
* Complete reports and documents as required by CSC policies and procedures
* Participate in training and information sessions as required
* Maintain accurate and up-to-date records and documents

**Security Requirements:**

The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and obtain approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). The contractor must also comply with the provisions of the Contract Security Manual.

**Criteria for Assessment of Statement of Capabilities:**

Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that it meets the following requirements:

* Must have 1 year experience, obtained within the last 5 years prior to the ACAN closing date, working in the criminal justice system.
* Must have 1 year experience, obtained within the last 5 years prior to the ACAN closing date, providing case management services to at-risk populations.
